sections.title: Who I Am
content: I'm Tian Pretorius, a Software engineer with over 5 years of hands-on experience in automation, systems design, and full-stack development. My work has centered on crafting scalable solutions that integrate hardware and software, from image analysis tools using Python and OpenCV to Bluetooth-enabled RFID prototypes with cross-platform mobile and web apps.

I've led R&D initiatives tackling challenges like adoption barriers in tracking technologies and digital security protocols, always prioritizing compliant, efficient architectures. Whether optimizing production workflows or developing regulatory-focused applications, I thrive on turning complex problems into robust, impactful tech.

sections.title: What I Do
sections.intro: I specialize in building robust, scalable web applications and architecting systems that can handle growth. My focus is on:
list: Full-stack development (Python, Java, C#, HTML, CSS, JS, Django)
Database design and SQL for scalable data management
System architecture, scalability, and secure protocol implementation
R&D prototyping, from embedded systems to compliant automation tools
Technical leadership, cross-functional collaboration, and problem-solving in dynamic environments

sections.title: My Journey
content: My engineering path began in academia, where I dove into computer and electronic engineering, building a strong foundation in embedded systems, programming, and data analytics. This sparked my passion for creating solutions that connect the physical and digital worlds‚Äîwhether through IoT-enabled designs or data-driven efficiencies that support decisions in fast-paced industries.

From there, I've progressed through roles in R&D and technical leadership, prototyping innovative hardware-software hybrids like mobile RFID readers and developing full-lifecycle software for compliance and automation. Highlights include crafting particle recognition algorithms for precision testing and optimizing scalable production systems. Now, with 5+ years under my belt, I'm primarily seeking to channel this expertise into a collaborative software engineering role, while honing my skills through personal projects. Let's chat about how I can help tackle your team's next big challenge.
